chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
lq: Ordered.sort Label
lc: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
pts: seq nid
Lab_neq: is_true (lq != lc)
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
serialize: Data -> seq nat
deserialize: seq nat -> Data
ds_inverse: left_inverse serialize deserialize
n: Equality.sort nat_eqType
h: PCM.sort (union_map_classPCM heapUMC)
d': Data
d: Data

Goal:
core_state_to_data n h d -> core_state_to_data n h d' -> d = d'

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
union_map_classPCM : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V -> pcm
Data = (nat * Log)%type : Type
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation PCM T m := (PCM T m)
heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (axioms.dynamic id)
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive (T:=T) ordering; _ : transitive (T:=T) ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type) (c : class_of T
Notation seq := list
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
left_inverse = fun (A B : Type) (op : A -> B) (inv : B -> A) => forall x : A, inv (op x) = x : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> (B -> A) -> Prop Arguments left_inverse {A B}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Module Equality := Struct Definition block : forall A : Type, A -> A. Parameter JMeq_eq_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), JMeq_eq JMeq_refl = erefl x. Parameter UIP_refl_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), UIP_refl A x (erefl x) = erefl (erefl x). Parameter inj_pairT2_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (P : A -> Type) (p : P x), inj_pairT2 A P x p p (erefl (existT P x p)) = erefl p. Record DependentEliminationPackage (A : Type) : Type := Build_DependentEliminationPackage
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
core_state_to_data = fun (n : nat_eqType) (h : union_map_classPCM heapUMC) (d : Data) => if n == cn then h = st :-> (d.1, CInit) \+ log :-> d.2 else h = st :-> (d.1, PInit) \+ log :-> d.2 : nat_eqType -> union_map_classPCM heapUMC -> Data -> Prop
msg_story_rely : forall (lq : Label) (pc : protocol) (Data : Type) (qnodes : seq nat) (serialize : Data -> seq nat) (core_state_to_data : nid -> heap -> Data -> Prop), (forall (n : nid) (h : heap) (d d' : Data), core_state_to_data n h d -> core_state_to_data n h d' -> d = d') -> lq != plab pc -> forall this : nid, this \in qnodes -> forall local_indicator : Data ->...-> msg_story lq pc Data qnodes serialize core_state_to_data this local_indicator s2 req_num to data reqs resp

tryrecv_resp : forall (lq : Label) (pc : protocol) (Data : Type) (qnodes : seq nat) (serialize : Data -> seq nat) (core_state_to_data : nid -> heap -> Data -> Prop), lq != plab pc -> forall this : nid, nat -> nid -> DT this (W lq pc Data qnodes serialize core_state_to_data) (option (nid * nat * seq nat))

query_init_rely : forall (lq : Label) (pc : protocol) (Data : Type) (qnodes : seq nat) (serialize : Data -> seq nat) (core_state_to_data : nid -> heap -> Data -> Prop), lq != plab pc -> forall (this to : nid) (s s2 : state), query_init_state lq Data qnodes serialize this to s -> network_rely (W lq pc Data qnodes serialize core_state_to_data) this s s2 -> query_init_state lq Data qnodes serialize this to s2
TwoPhaseCoordinator.send_prep : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts), nat -> seq nat -> nid -> DT cn (mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) (seq nat)

getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find (cT:=union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
TwoPhaseCoordinator.coordinator_round : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts), uniq pts -> pts != [::] -> forall d : data, {(e : nat)(lg : Log)}, DHT [cn,mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (e, CInit) \+ log :-> lg, fun (res : bool) (m : state) => getLocal cn (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (e.+1, CInit) \+ log :-> rcons lg (res, d))

getStK : forall (nodes : seq nat) (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (C : QueryProtocol.QCoh nodes d) (s : QueryProtocol.qstate), getLocal n d = QueryProtocol.st : -> s -> QueryProtocol.getSt (nodes:=nodes) n (d:=d) C = s
holds_res_perms = fun (this : nid) (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (pp : nat -> Prop) => exists reqs resp : seq (nid * nat), getLocal n d = qst : -> (reqs, resp) /\ (forall rn : nat_eqType, (this, rn) \in resp -> pp rn) : nid -> dstatelet -> nid -> (nat -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments holds_res_perms _ _ _ _%function_scope
QueryHooked.receive_resp_loop_obligation_3 : forall (lq : Label) (pc : protocol) (Data : Type) (qnodes : seq nat) (serialize : Data -> seq nat) (core_state_to_data : nid -> heap -> Data -> Prop) (this : nid), DT this (W lq pc Data qnodes serialize core_state_to_data) (option Data) -> DT this (W lq pc Data qnodes serialize core_state_to_data) (option Data)
QueryProtocol.qcoh = fun (nodes : seq nat) (d : dstatelet) => [/\ QueryProtocol.soupCoh (dsoup d), valid (dstate d), dom (cT:=union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap) (dstate d) =i nodes & forall n : [ordType of nid], n \in dom (cT:=union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap) (dstate d) -> QueryProtocol.localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : seq nat -> dstatelet -> Prop Arguments QueryProtocol.qcoh _%seq_scope

```coq
intros.
inversion 1.
inversion 1.
subst.
auto.
Qed.
